text:
e="preserve">Luo Haocai (; March 1934 – 12 February 2018) was a Chinese legal scholar, Supreme Court judge, and politician. He was born in Singapore. He served as professor and Vice President of Peking University, Vice President of the Supreme People's Court, Chairman of the China Zhi Gong Party (Public Interest Party), and Vice Chairperson of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC).
Luo died in Beijing on 12 February 2018 at the age of 83.

annotations.surface_form: Vice Chairperson of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
